name: solveWatchAi
description: AI-powered screenshot and clipboard monitor that automatically extracts text from images, analyzes code problems, and provides intelligent solutions using multiple AI providers (OpenAI, Groq, Gemini) with automatic fallback. Features OCR text extraction, context-aware processing, and email notifications.

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../python-service && if [ ! -d venv ]; then echo 'üì¶ Creating Python virtual environment...' && if command -v python3.12 &> /dev/null; then python3.12 -m venv venv && echo '‚úÖ Virtual environment created with Python 3.12'; elif command -v python3.11 &> /dev/null; then python3.11 -m venv venv && echo '‚úÖ Virtual environment created with Python 3.11'; else python3 -m venv venv && echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Using Python 3.13 (some packages may have compatibility issues)'; fi; fi && if ! command -v ffmpeg &> /dev/null; then echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  FFmpeg not found.
